raw_comment:
1. I notice that China uses coal as their most used fossil fuel. They also use the most clean power. 
I wonder if this has anything to do with their high population. 
This relates to my community because of the impacts of using these different energy sources have on my future.
ace_sentences: Coal is the most used fossil fuel in China.
China uses the most clean power.
I wonder whether the high population in China relates to the energy use in China.
Different energy sources have impacts on my future.
The impacts of using different energy sources relate to my community.
